channel.title: How do I stop magic on certain npcs? PLEASE HELP!
channel.description:
Hi.
[b]Server Base:[/b] Iedge [b]Problem:[/b] You can use magic on npcs that have 0 Hp. [b]What I need:[/b] I need some help to stop using magic on certain npcs. [b]Other:[/b] My servers magic is very complex. It has a magic handler which is called mhandler.java
Please help me!
Thanks.
